description:
Callum is tall. Very tall. At 6’6”, he’s one of the tallest guys we’ve filmed. When he's not in school, he spends most of his free time outdoors.
He’s skateboarded most of his life and he started wake boarding about three years ago. He loves to do anything out at the lake where he lives, from swimming to skinny-dipping (which could explain his full body tan).
Callum has a very deep, sexy voice. He’s got a lean skater build, with chiseled abs that must be a result of all that time spent maneuvering his skateboard.
His cock is thick at the base with big hairy balls. When he started jacking off on the sofa, he took advantage of every position he could, pumping his hips, flexing his chest and squeezing his muscled ass!
title: Callum
